title: President grieved over loss of lives caused by Coronavirus in China
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 27 (APP):President Dr. Arif Alvi on Monday expressed his deep grief and sorrow over the loss of precious lives in China caused by the outbreak of Coronavirus.
In a message, he expressed solidarity with Chinese nation and said the people of Pakistan stood with their Chinese brethren in this difficult hour.
The President also sympathized with the affected families.
